headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On the Podium this Week: Bravado Verlierer
content: Make sure to stop by The Diamond Casino & Resort and drop by the lobby to give the Lucky Wheel a spin and walk away with GTA$, RP, clothing, and more. This week’s top prize on the podium is the Bravado Verlierer, a roadster that takes all the best parts of the lax regulation of the Sixties and buffs them to a collector’s lustrous sheen.
